alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Henderson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 5:21PM EDT until June 25 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Warrick County in southwestern Indiana... Spencer County in southwestern Indiana... Northeastern Daviess County in northwestern Kentucky... Eastern Henderson County in northwestern Kentucky... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 420 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Boonville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Boonville, Newburgh, Chandler, Rockport, Grandview, Eureka, Chrisney, Tennyson and Waitman. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Indiana...and northwestern Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Indiana...and northwestern Kentucky.
